categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic divisions

nodes.text: The 22nd infantry division was a military unit of Rebel soldiers that was formed in 1 BBY. Trained at a hidden base in the Outer Rim Territories, they had not seen combat. Despite their fear, they harbored a hatred for the Galactic Empire that Jedi General Rahm Kota planned to use against the numerically superior Imperial Military.
The 22nd infantry division was mentioned in the Rebel Soldiers' Databank entry in the PS3 and Xbox 360 versions of the 2010 video game Star Wars: The Force Unleashed II.
